long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
ğŸ§ **Turn any text on the internet into a narrator's voice.** Read any website and boost your productivity! ğŸš€

ğŸŒ Imagine being able to listen to texts from any website effortlessly. With our new extension, itâ€™s possible! ğŸ™ï¸

âœ¨ **Innovative Chrome extension**, based on advanced Text-to-Speech (TTS) technology, makes reading any content easier than ever before. ğŸ“š

ğŸ”Š **The extension will turn any text you select on the internet into a narrator's voice.** Perfect for those who value their time and convenience! â³

âœ… **Select the text, right-click, and choose "Read selected"** â€” itâ€™s that simple! ğŸ‘Œ

ğŸ› ï¸ **Integrated context menu**
  
ğŸ›ï¸ **Full control**  

âš™ï¸ **Customize settings** in the pop-up menu: language, volume, and narrator preferences ğŸšï¸

ğŸŒ **Choose from 18 languages!**  

ğŸ–±ï¸ **Just select the text on the page, and the narrator will read the highlighted content** ğŸ§

ğŸš€ This extension is a true revolution in time management during learning and work. Increase your productivity and comfort with our modern technology. ğŸ’¡

â—**Disclaimer**: All product and company names are trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective holders. This extension has no affiliation or connection with them or any third-party companies. â—
